metadata.dc:author: Rivarés Esteban, J J
Marín García, J
Gil Paraíso, P J
Martín Martín, J M
metadata.dc:description: Giant pleomorphic adenoma is the most common neoplasm of salivary glands, specially of parotitis. Less frequently derives from minor salivary glands and, in the case, its size is small. We report one case of pleomorphic adenoma of great mass seated in a palatine salivary gland and avail the opportunity to review these sort of tumors.
metadata.dc:title: Adenoma pleomórfico gigante en glándula salival accesoria.
[Giant pleomorphic adenoma in accessory salivary gland].
